title: Ellis Island Part of Statue of Liberty National Monument: Exploring the Museum
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Exploring the Museum              Exploring the Ellis Island Museum         Main Immigration Building, Ellis Island NPS/Kevin Daley, Photographer  We invite you to explore the museum and see some of the features that you will see when you make a visit to Ellis Island.           Ground Floor Touch the picture to see the exhibts located on the ground floor of the museum.           Second Floor Touch the picture to see the exhibits available on the second floor of the museum.           Third Floor Touch the picture to see the many exhibits that highlight the development of Ellis Island and its unique place in U.S. history.            Special Exhibit Touch the picture to see the Special Exhibits on Ellis Island.
